title: How to Mass Change Privacy Settings for Old Facebook Posts

steps.title: Log in.
steps.content: Log in. After you've logged into your Facebook account, access your settings by clicking on "Settings."

steps.title: Once you've done this, click on "Privacy" under "Settings."
steps.content: Once you've done this, click on "Privacy" under "Settings."

steps.title: Click on "Limit Past Posts" under "Who Can See My Stuff?"
steps.content: Click on "Limit Past Posts" under "Who Can See My Stuff?"

steps.title: Click on "Confirm."
steps.content: Click on "Confirm." Or, if you've changed your mind, click on "Cancel."

steps.title: Click on "Limit audience for posts you've shared with Friends of Friends or Public?"
steps.content: Click on "Limit audience for posts you've shared with Friends of Friends or Public?"

steps.title: Click on "Confirm."
steps.content: Click on "Confirm." Or, if you've changed your mind, click on "Cancel."

steps.title: Click on "Limit audience for posts you've shared with Friends of Friends or Public?"
steps.content: Click on "Limit audience for posts you've shared with Friends of Friends or Public?"

steps.title: Click on "Confirm."
steps.content: Click on "Confirm." Or, if you've changed your mind, click on "Cancel."
